parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Silviu Coșa, a PNL candidate for the Romanian Senate.  This directly refers to a candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, aiming to reach a wide audience. The reach estimate is 100K-500K, further supporting this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post discusses Silviu Coșa's plans as a future parliamentarian and his party's lessons learned from a recent vote. This clearly aims to influence voters' perception of the candidate and potentially increase votes for him, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially. While the post presents information about the candidate, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. The focus is on promoting the candidate's perspective and plans, rather than providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece highlighting a candidate's views and plans, clearly intended to sway voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>864861295517511</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 864861295517511, promotes Silviu Coșa, a PNL candidate for the Romanian Senate.  While presented as a news segment by "Tomis Tv," the content focuses on the candidate's plans and his party's post-election analysis, clearly aiming to influence voters. The paid nature of the post on a public platform, coupled with its direct reference to a specific candidate and its electoral objective, strongly suggests it constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post's reach estimate (100K-500K) indicates a significant potential impact on the election.  Although the post does not explicitly urge voters to vote for Coșa, the implicit endorsement through positive portrayal is sufficient to classify it as propaganda.  The end date of the ad (1732953600) needs to be checked against the official end date of the electoral campaign to determine if it violates the prohibition on post-election propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Silviu Coșa</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Tomis Tv</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Tomis Tv, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 864861295517511) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează candidatul PNL la Senat, Silviu Coșa, prezentându-i planurile și analizând rezultatele recente ale partidului într-un mod favorabil, cu scopul clar de a influența votul alegătorilor.  Postarea, plătită și cu o estimare a audienței de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, îndeplinește toate criteriile articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, referindu-se direct la un candidat, adresându-se publicului larg și având un obiectiv electoral evident.  Chiar dacă nu solicită explicit votul pentru Coșa, prezentarea pozitivă și contextul electoral fac din această postare o formă de propagandă interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.  Contactul Tomis Tv este h_dorian@yahoo.com și +40752181038, iar cheltuielile de publicitate au fost sub 100 RON.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
